name: Necromancer's army
description:
Welcome, Necromancer!

So, one black magician asked you to collect 857432454 dark magic particles. He need it to cast spell that will DESTROY everything. 
Let's help him!

Rules:
- You get score for delevering particles from your lair to magician's cave

- You can spend your blood on upgrades

- You loose blood every moment. 0 blood and your are dead

- 1 particle is created in your lair when your undeads arrives to black magic sourse inside the castle

- Castle get's XP when your zombie is killed. When it has enough XP, it gets a new level, so the number of guards is increased

Controls:
F - summon undead

TAB - store

Left mouse button - attack

Escape - pause
